0.name: Told Ya! Magic Happens
0.fullDesc: Rearranges the numbers of "Interpretation" stacks on all enemies, prioritizing the transfer of the higher numbers of "Interpretation" stacks to Elite-level targets and above. Then, deals Ice DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of The Herta's ATK to all enemies. When using Ultimate, increases The Herta's ATK by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{5}} turn(s). After the use, The Herta immediately takes action and gains 1 stack of "Inspiration." "Inspiration" can stack up to {{6}} time(s). While having "Inspiration," enhances Skill to "Hear Me Out."
0.shortDesc: <orangeStrong>Rearranges the numbers of "Interpretation" stacks</orangeStrong> on all enemies, prioritizing the transfer of the higher numbers of "Interpretation" stacks to Elite-level targets and above. Then, deals Ice DMG to all enemies. After use, enhances Skill and immediately takes action.

0.name: Hand Them Over
0.fullDesc: When enemy targets enter battle, The Herta inflicts 1 stack of "Interpretation" on them. At the start of each wave, applies {{6}} stack(s) of "Interpretation" to a random enemy target, prioritizing Elite-level targets and above. When the Enhanced Skill's primary target has "Interpretation," the multiplier for the DMG dealt increases, with each stack granting an increase of <orangeStrong>{{1, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>/<orangeStrong>{{2, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong> on the primary target/other targets respectively. If 2 or more characters follow the Path of Erudition in the team, each stack grants an additional increase of <orangeStrong>{{1, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>/<orangeStrong>{{2, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong> on the primary target/other targets respectively. "Interpretation" can stack up to {{3}} time(s). When using the Enhanced Skill, resets the number of "Interpretation" stacks on the primary target to 1. After the enemy target leaves the field or gets defeated by any unit, "Interpretation" will be transferred, prioritizing the transfer to Elite-level targets and above.
0.shortDesc: Enhanced Skill <orangeStrong>increases the DMG dealt based on the target's "Interpretation" stacks</orangeStrong>.
